I would recommend taking a look at "Aladdin" and "Flags of Our Fathers". They both have engaging plots that are sure to keep you interested throughout their respective runtimes.
As for which one you should watch first, well, it really depends on your personal preferences.
For example, if you're a fan of musicals and catchy tunes, then I would highly recommend checking out "Aladdin" as soon as possible.
On the other hand, if you're more interested in historical events and war stories, then I would definitely recommend taking a look at "Flags of Our Fathers" as well.
So, ultimately, it really depends on your personal preferences. And so, I hope that my recommendations have been helpful for you, and that you enjoy watching both "Aladdin" and "Flags of Our Fathers".

Here are some recommendations based on the user's preference cues:

1. Prometheus (2012))
This movie explores the concept of humanity's gift of fire. It features a talented cast, including Patrick Wilson and Kate Dickie.

2. What Women Want (2000))
This classic romantic comedy tells the story of a man who has trouble understanding what women want in terms of love and relationships.

3. Tears of the Sun (2003))
This intense action thriller tells the story of a Special-Operations commander who leads his team into the Nigerian jungle to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

Overall, these movies offer different perspectives on love and relationships. Whether you prefer a romantic comedy or an intense action thriller, there is something for everyone in this list of movies.
